posts.post_content:
I have a bunch of cards available. Most of these were upgraded or I determined they didn't upgrade my set......

Buyer pays $2 shipping, no matter how many you buy. PayPal friends preferred. Anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority over negotiations. 

Listening to offers, especially on groups. Will consider trades too.

$SOLD Mike Donlin Sitting EPDG raw
$SOLD Dahlen Boston Piedmont 150 SGC 20
$CLOSED Tannehill "no L" Beckett raw 5.0
$SOLD Joshua Clark BVG 3
$CLOSED Al Orth Southern League SCD 3
$SOLD Red Murray portrait SGC 35
$TRADED Nick Maddox SGC 60
$CLOSED Jimmy Lavender PSA 5
$SOLD Bobby Byrne SGC 30

I'll take the Donlin.
